mapper.select: select ID, INIT_SERVER_NO, LAB_ID, CONSIGNMENT_ID, CONSIGN_ORG_CODE, PHYSICAL_EVIDENCE_ID, SAMPLE_NO, SAMPLE_LAB_NO, SAMPLE_NAME, SAMPLE_TYPE, SPECIALTY, COLOR, PATTERN, TEXTURE, SHAPE, AMOUNT, EVIDENCE_SIZE, SPECIAL_SIGN, IS_COLLECT, IS_TEST, COLLECT_METHOD, COLLECT_POS, COLLECT_REASON, COLLECT_AGENCY_CODE, COLLECT_AGENCY_NAME, COLLECT_DATETIME, COLLECT_USER, TEST_ORG_CODE, TEST_ORG_NAME, TEST_DATETIME, TESTER, PRE_EXAM_INFO, PRE_EXAM_METHOD, PRE_EXAM_DESC, SAMPLE_PACKAGING, SAMPLE_DESC, FTA_FLAG, ACCEPT_OPINION, SAMPLE_STATUS, TEST_PHASE, DELETE_FLAG, GENE_STORE_FLAG, TRANSFER_FLAG, TRANSFER_USER, TRANSFER_DATETIME, IS_APPEND, SPECIMEN_SEQ_NO, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, REMARK, DATA_SOURCE, DATA_LEVEL, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME, SELF_OBJECT_ID, RELATION_OBJECT_ID, RELATION, PERSON_RELATION_DESC, COLLECT_PURPOSE, TYPE_EXTRA_INFO, SPECIAL_DEAL_OPTION, SAMPLE_SERIAL_NO, EXT_ID, SIGN_UPLOAD, LOCAL_STORE_DATETIME, LOCAL_CREATE_DATETIME, VA from SAMPLE_INFO where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, INIT_SERVER_NO, LAB_ID, CONSIGNMENT_ID, CONSIGN_ORG_CODE, PHYSICAL_EVIDENCE_ID, SAMPLE_NO, SAMPLE_LAB_NO, SAMPLE_NAME, SAMPLE_TYPE, SPECIALTY, COLOR, PATTERN, TEXTURE, SHAPE, AMOUNT, EVIDENCE_SIZE, SPECIAL_SIGN, IS_COLLECT, IS_TEST, COLLECT_METHOD, COLLECT_POS, COLLECT_REASON, COLLECT_AGENCY_CODE, COLLECT_AGENCY_NAME, COLLECT_DATETIME, COLLECT_USER, TEST_ORG_CODE, TEST_ORG_NAME, TEST_DATETIME, TESTER, PRE_EXAM_INFO, PRE_EXAM_METHOD, PRE_EXAM_DESC, SAMPLE_PACKAGING, SAMPLE_DESC, FTA_FLAG, ACCEPT_OPINION, SAMPLE_STATUS, TEST_PHASE, DELETE_FLAG, GENE_STORE_FLAG, TRANSFER_FLAG, TRANSFER_USER, TRANSFER_DATETIME, IS_APPEND, SPECIMEN_SEQ_NO, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, REMARK, DATA_SOURCE, DATA_LEVEL, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME, SELF_OBJECT_ID, RELATION_OBJECT_ID, RELATION, PERSON_RELATION_DESC, COLLECT_PURPOSE, TYPE_EXTRA_INFO, SPECIAL_DEAL_OPTION, SAMPLE_SERIAL_NO, EXT_ID, SIGN_UPLOAD, LOCAL_STORE_DATETIME, LOCAL_CREATE_DATETIME, VA from SAMPLE_INFO where CONSIGNMENT_ID = #{consignmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and INIT_SERVER_NO like ''||#{initServerNoLike,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'

select ID, INIT_SERVER_NO, LAB_ID, CONSIGNMENT_ID, CONSIGN_ORG_CODE, PHYSICAL_EVIDENCE_ID, SAMPLE_NO, SAMPLE_LAB_NO, SAMPLE_NAME, SAMPLE_TYPE, SPECIALTY, COLOR, PATTERN, TEXTURE, SHAPE, AMOUNT, EVIDENCE_SIZE, SPECIAL_SIGN, IS_COLLECT, IS_TEST, COLLECT_METHOD, COLLECT_POS, COLLECT_REASON, COLLECT_AGENCY_CODE, COLLECT_AGENCY_NAME, COLLECT_DATETIME, COLLECT_USER, TEST_ORG_CODE, TEST_ORG_NAME, TEST_DATETIME, TESTER, PRE_EXAM_INFO, PRE_EXAM_METHOD, PRE_EXAM_DESC, SAMPLE_PACKAGING, SAMPLE_DESC, FTA_FLAG, ACCEPT_OPINION, SAMPLE_STATUS, TEST_PHASE, DELETE_FLAG, GENE_STORE_FLAG, TRANSFER_FLAG, TRANSFER_USER, TRANSFER_DATETIME, IS_APPEND, SPECIMEN_SEQ_NO, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, REMARK, DATA_SOURCE, DATA_LEVEL, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME, SELF_OBJECT_ID, RELATION_OBJECT_ID, RELATION, PERSON_RELATION_DESC, COLLECT_PURPOSE, TYPE_EXTRA_INFO, SPECIAL_DEAL_OPTION, SAMPLE_SERIAL_NO, EXT_ID, SIGN_UPLOAD, LOCAL_STORE_DATETIME, LOCAL_CREATE_DATETIME, VA from SAMPLE_INFO

select si.id,ci.ID AS CASE_ID,si.SAMPLE_NO, si.SAMPLE_NAME ,si.SAMPLE_TYPE, sdg.sample_flag as SAMPLE_FLAG, pi.id as REF_PERSON_ID, si.REMARK,si.CREATE_USER as CREATE_PERSON, si.CREATE_DATETIME,si.UPDATE_USER as UPDATE_USER,si.UPDATE_DATETIME,null as INSTORED_FLAG from SAMPLE_INFO si ,consignment ct ,case_info ci,SAMPLE_DNA_GENE sdg ,SAMPLE_PERSON_MAP spm,PERSON_INFO pi where pi.id =spm.person_object_id and spm.sample_id =si.id and si.id = sdg.sample_id and si.CONSIGNMENT_ID = ct.ID AND ct.EVENT_ID = ci.ID and pi.delete_flag ='0' and si.delete_flag = 0 AND ci.ID=#{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: si.ID, si.INIT_SERVER_NO, si.LAB_ID, si.CONSIGNMENT_ID, si.CONSIGN_ORG_CODE, si.PHYSICAL_EVIDENCE_ID, si.SAMPLE_NO, si.SAMPLE_LAB_NO, si.SAMPLE_NAME, si.SAMPLE_TYPE, si.SPECIALTY, si.COLOR, si.PATTERN, si.TEXTURE, si.SHAPE, si.AMOUNT, si.EVIDENCE_SIZE, si.SPECIAL_SIGN, si.IS_COLLECT, si.IS_TEST, si.COLLECT_METHOD, si.COLLECT_POS, si.COLLECT_REASON, si.COLLECT_AGENCY_CODE, si.COLLECT_AGENCY_NAME, si.COLLECT_DATETIME, si.COLLECT_USER, si.TEST_ORG_CODE, si.TEST_ORG_NAME, si.TEST_DATETIME, si.TESTER, si.PRE_EXAM_INFO, si.PRE_EXAM_METHOD, si.PRE_EXAM_DESC, si.SAMPLE_PACKAGING, si.SAMPLE_DESC, si.FTA_FLAG, si.ACCEPT_OPINION, si.SAMPLE_STATUS, si.TEST_PHASE, si.DELETE_FLAG, si.GENE_STORE_FLAG, si.TRANSFER_FLAG, si.TRANSFER_USER, si.TRANSFER_DATETIME, si.IS_APPEND, si.SPECIMEN_SEQ_NO, si.RESERVE1, si.RESERVE2, si.RESERVE3, si.RESERVE4, si.RESERVE5, si.RESERVE6, si.REMARK, si.DATA_SOURCE, si.DATA_LEVEL, si.CREATE_USER, si.CREATE_DATETIME, si.UPDATE_USER, si.UPDATE_DATETIME, si.SELF_OBJECT_ID, si.RELATION_OBJECT_ID, si.RELATION, si.PERSON_RELATION_DESC, si.COLLECT_PURPOSE, si.TYPE_EXTRA_INFO, si.SPECIAL_DEAL_OPTION, si.SAMPLE_SERIAL_NO, si.EXT_ID, si.SIGN_UPLOAD, si.LOCAL_STORE_DATETIME, si.LOCAL_CREATE_DATETIME, si.VA
mapper.select:
select spm.PERSON_OBJECT_ID as REF_PERSON_ID, spm.RELATION,
from SAMPLE_INFO si, SAMPLE_PERSON_MAP spm where spm.sample_id =si.id and si.CONSIGNMENT_ID=#{consignmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and spm.RELATION in (#{selfRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfPossibleRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and si.DELETE_FLAG=0

select spm.PERSON_OBJECT_ID as REF_PERSON_ID, spm.RELATION,
from SAMPLE_INFO si, SAMPLE_PERSON_MAP spm where spm.sample_id =si.id and si.CONSIGNMENT_ID=#{consignmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and si.DELETE_FLAG=0
